It is a great value for money phone but i would still not suggest to buy it because it has a faulty charging port and this is its manufacturing defect, it was working great in the beginning and after one month it has started to have charging problem like not charging sometimes and sometimes turbo charging was not working and many more, and as soon as i brought it to the service center as soon as i told them its a Motorola phone with charging issue they directly asked me whether is it G85 edge and i told yes so they show me 3-4 brand new phones all with same issue all were under warranty and were bought within 1-2 months. They were getting replacement of charging board free of cost but still nobody wants to have their brand new purchased phone to take to service center and open up. And everybody know that once the phone gets opened its never going t be same because service centers  don't use adhesive to glue them as good as it comes from factory there will always be a gap and always a chance to open up someday by its own.
